gmiSection.title: Parallel Agency
gmiSection.subtitle: Build sophisticated AI systems with adaptive personas and emergent, dynamic behaviors. Route inbound support tickets to the right persona, push CRM updates safely, and keep every RAG workflow inside deterministic guardrails. AgentOS GMIs enable autonomous agents that learn, adapt, and evolve‚Äîthen export those insights as portable intelligence bundles.
whatYouGetItems: Persona library for research, analysis, creation, critique, execution, and future GMIs.
Deterministic orchestration with guardrails, budgets, approvals, and SOC2/GDPR-ready event trails.
Unified memory fabric (working, episodic, vector) plus portable exports for Markdown/JSON ingestion.

snapshots.outcome: Researcher gathers context, Analyst verifies facts, and Executor pushes the outcome into Salesforce or Linear automatically.
Orchestrator enforces guardrails, memory logs every decision, and Event Stream keeps auditors in the loop for SOC2/GDPR.
Creator + Executor personas adapt content by locale while Gateway throttles workloads and exports full runs as Markdown/JSON.

ui.label: User Interfaces

gateway.outcome: Tenants, rate budgets, and approvals stay deterministic even when agents spawn in parallel.

agents.outcome: Each persona can be exported as Markdown/JSON capsules and ingested into other runtimes.

memory.outcome: Zero-copy working, episodic, and vector layers keep adaptive and permanent intelligence aligned.

events.label: Event Stream

events.details: Observability and compliance pipeline for every step.

events.outcome: Every action is replayable for SOC2, GDPR, and custom guardrails.

hero.title: About AgentOS
hero.description: AgentOS is an open‚Äësource TypeScript runtime for building adaptive, emergent AI agent systems. Built by {link}, AgentOS powers intelligent applications with GMI orchestration, persistent memory, and enterprise‚Äëgrade guardrails.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We‚Äôre building the most advanced AI agent runtime for developers who want to create intelligent, adaptive systems without compromising on control, safety, or performance.
mission.p2: AgentOS combines cutting-edge AI orchestration with production-ready infrastructure, enabling developers to build everything from simple chatbots to complex multi-agent systems with {span} memory architecture.

team.title: The Team
team.description: AgentOS is developed by the team at {link}, a company focused on building the future of AI‚Äëpowered development tools. We're a distributed team of engineers, designers, and AI researchers passionate about making advanced AI accessible to all developers.
team.enterpriseSupportDesc: For production deployments, enterprise licensing, and dedicated support
team.joinUs: Join us in building the future of autonomous agents.

license.title: Open Source Licensing
license.coreDesc: The core AgentOS runtime, GMI orchestration, and infrastructure
license.footer: We believe in open source. AgentOS is free to use, modify, and distribute. For enterprise support and production deployments, contact us at {link}

whatIsAgentOS.question: What is AgentOS?
whatIsAgentOS.answer: AgentOS is a modular platform for building adaptive, policy‚Äëaware agents with tooling, memory, and multi‚Äëagent collaboration.

integration.question: How does it integrate with VCA?
